DOC.brief_summary: This randomised trial two modern single electric breast pump allocate mother exclusively breast feed healthy term infant . Mothers recruit infant around month old , randomise either use one two state art modern single electric breast pump act control breast pump ( receive baby care voucher similar value ) . If allocate breast pump , mother ask take part physiological study baby 6 week old . In test mother ask express breast milk 10 minute breast . The primary hypothesis total weight milk produce 20 minute period weight milk produce 1 minute interval age 6 week great mother use one pump . A small sample breast milk ( ~5ml ) collect analysis , remain express milk return mother . Each month age 3 6 month , mother ask complete online questionnaire breast-feeding use breast pump ( one ) . At end six month mother give small voucher child-care store way say 'thank-you ' inconvenience cause .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Two Electric Breast Pumps Mothers Term Infants .
DOC.criteria: Mothers deliver healthy , term , singleton infant contraindication successful breast feeding . Mothers exclusively breast feed willing randomise either use breast pump continue breastfeed without use breast pump . Not already use breast pump . Can speak , read write English ( Chinese Beijing centre Russian Moscow centre ) Mothers ineligible join study : If mixed formula feeding . Have illness may prevent express breast milk . Are willing randomly assign pump control group Already express milk regularly .
DOC.keyword: Breast pump , breast milk , expression , term infant
